summary.para: Creates a property store object from serialized property store data.

param.name: guidProp
param.para: Contains the type identifier of the property. For more information, see .

param.name: pRange
param.para: Pointer to an object that contains the text to be covered by the property store.

param.name: cb
param.para: Contains the size, in bytes, of the property store data contained in pStream.

param.name: pStream
param.para: Pointer to an IStream object that contains the property store data.

param.name: ppStore
param.para: Pointer to an interface pointer that receives the property store object created by this method.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: Determines if a property store can be stored as persistent data.

param.name: guidProp
param.para: Contains the type identifier of the property. For more information, see .

param.name: pRange
param.para: Pointer to an object that contains the text covered by the property store.

param.name: pfSerializable
param.para: Pointer to a BOOL that receives a flag that indicates if the property store can be serialized. Receives nonzero if the property store can be serialized or zero otherwise.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: The ITfCreatePropertyStore interface is implemented by a text service to support persistence of property store data. The TSF manager uses this interface to determine if a property store can be serialized and to create a property store object for a serialized property.

remarks.para: When a property store is unserialized, the TSF manager creates an object from the CLSID obtained from and obtain an ITfCreatePropertyStore interface pointer from it. The manager then uses ITfCreatePropertyStore.CreatePropertyStore to create the property store object.
